description: Bruto: This is your monthly gross salary
Jaarloon: This is your annual wage VAT
Pensioenpremie: This is the monthly premium you paid for your pension (old age insurence)
LH/LH Korting: This is the applicable tax or tax discount for your salary
Salaris: This is your base salary
ZVW: This signifies whether your employer covered your health insurance
WW: This signifies whether your employer covered your unemployment insurance
WIA: This signifies whether your employer covered your incapacity-of-work insurance
WAO: This signifies whether your employer covered your disability insurance
ZW: This signifies whether your employer covered your sickness benefit
Loonheffing: This is the total amount of your salary that is actually taxable
Vakantie geld: This is the holiday payment reserve for the month
Reserveringen: This is the total holiday reserve you have accrued
Saldo: This is the total holiday reserve you have accrued
Vorige: This is the total holiday reserve from the previous months
